channel.title: RaspController on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in RaspController on LC-Research

item.title: Setting up a Raspberry Pi Media Server
item.description: I got a whole bunch of movies, audio files and photos on my laptop. I am tired of copying these files to other devices at home. Is there anyway to keep them in one location and stream to all of my TVs, mobile phones, tablets and computers on the home network.
